availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas Jones (Campbell County, KY, farmer and deputy court clerk)

body.p: Campbell County, Kentucky, farmer and deputy court clerk. Ohio native. Married Anna. M. Grubb in 1847. Married Elizabeth Green Jones in 1850. Stepfather of Lulu M. Jones. Farmer in Campbell County in 1850. Farmer in Campbell County in 1860. Employed Joseph Weeks as a laborer in Campbell County in 1860. Deputy court clerk in Campbell County in 1864.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Campbell County, District 2, p. 98B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Campbell County, p. 762.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Campbell County, Alexandria, p. 141B.
W. H. Perrin, J. H. Battle, and G. C. Kniffin, Kentucky: A History of the State, 7th ed. (Louisville and Chicago: F. A. Battey and Company, 1887), 827.
KYR-0001-004-1400.
